body:
Just a comment to:
>  When calling quote_value the underlying connection sometimes requires
>  more information about the column to properly return the correct quoted value.

That is sadly true also for select statements on SQL Server. I currently see a performance decline of factor 10 !  for single select, as the activerecord-sqlserver-adapter gets no information on the column in quote(value, column=nil) and quotes every value with N'..' so that the sql server does not use the index on this column (when this column is declared as VARCHAR )
But sadly I am new to RoR and ActiveRecord/Arel is to complex for me and got stuck in visit_Arel_Nodes_Equality
